content.coverAllAspects: Ihlanganisa isisekelo sokuyithuthukisa imiqondo ewuthuthukile kufaka phakathi amakhodi, amasistimu, amanethiwekhi, nokuningi.
content.viewAllIT: Dlulisa amehlo kuzo zonke izifundo ze-vivievlog kanye nezivivinyo zokuzijwayeza

metadata.lesson: Hlola izifundo zethu zamahhala bese ukhetha inkambo ephelele ukufanisa izinga lakho lekhono.
